column4: April 26 (Xinhua) — Cambodia ordered all public schools to reduce one hour off their regular school days due to scorching temperatures in the ongoing dry season
column5: according to a directive released late on Thursday.------The normal morning school session from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. will now conclude half an hour earlier
column7: usually lasting from 1:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.
column9: the directive said.------“During the dry season in 2019
column10: the weather is very hot and temperatures can be higher than 40 degrees Celsius between 10 a.m. and 2 p.m.
column11: ” Education Minister Hang Chuon Naron said in the directive
column12: adding that the measure was to “prevent heat-related illnesses”.------The measure will remain in place until the rainy season comes. The rainy season is expected in late May.------ ------http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2019-04/26/c_138012133.htm
